metadata.Title: CVE-2020-0465 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In various methods of hid-multitouch.c, there is a possible out of boundswrite due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation ofprivilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interactionis not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: AndroidkernelAndroid ID: A-162844689References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
